publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1551 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees the following revisions to the Business Motion agreed on 11 January 2001— Wednesday 17 January 2001 after Executive Debate on the Tobacco Advertising and Promotion Bill – UK Legislation, delete all and insert: followed by Debate on Convenership of Committees followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions 5.30 pm Decision Time followed by Members' Business - debate on the subject of S1M-1474 Janis Hughes: Acute Health Service Review in South Glasgow Supported by: Tavish Scott*
